trans-unit.source: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.
trans-unit.target: Uma contentor a linha cronológica que fornece o objeto e a propriedade filtragem informações para o respetivas animações subordinado.

trans-unit.source: ## Interactively Controlling Storyboards A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: ##Interativamente Storyboards controlar um guião gráfico principal controllable pode colocar em pausa, retomar, procurar, parar e ser removido.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar um guião gráfico principal controllable no markup, tem de especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>objeto que criá-lo; por exemplo, consulte [como: accionadores de eventos de utilização para controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar um guião gráfico principal controllable no código, tem de utilizar a sobrecarga adequada do storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>método e especifique `true` para torná-lo controllable.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte [como: controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Data Binding and Animating Timelines Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de linha cronológica de enlace de dados e Animating linhas cronológicas mais podem ser dados vinculado ou animada; No entanto, devido à forma como o sistema de temporização funciona, linhas cronológicas vinculadas ou animadas não comportar-se como outros dados de dados vinculado ou animada objetos.

trans-unit.source: To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline.
trans-unit.target: Para compreender o respetivo comportamento, ajuda a compreender o que significa ativar uma linha cronológica.

trans-unit.source: When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma linha cronológica é ativada, são efetuadas cópias da linha cronológica e respetivos linhas cronológicas subordinado.

trans-unit.source: These copies are frozen (made read-only) and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created from them.
trans-unit.target: Estas cópias são interrompidas (tornada só de leitura) e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos criados a partir de-los.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties.
trans-unit.target: Estes relógios fazem o trabalho real de animating as propriedades de destino.

trans-unit.source: If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver uma linha cronológica de enlace de dados ou animada, um instantâneo dos seus valores atuais é efetuado quando o relógio é criado.

trans-unit.source: Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not.
trans-unit.target: Apesar da linha cronológica original poderá continuar a alterar, o relógio não.

trans-unit.source: For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created.
trans-unit.target: Para uma linha cronológica refletir as alterações de enlace ou animação de dados, o relógio tem de ser recriado.

trans-unit.source: Clocks are not re-created for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: Relógios não estão novamente criados por si automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - If the timeline is or belongs to a Storyboard, you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se várias formas de aplicar alterações de linha cronológica:-se a linha cronológica ou pertence a um guião gráfico principal, pode tornar refletir alterações efetuadas por reapplying seu guião gráfico principal a utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: This has the side effect of also restarting the animation.
trans-unit.target: Isto tem o efeito de também reiniciar a animação.

trans-unit.source: In code, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position.
trans-unit.target: No código, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>método para avançar o storyboard de volta para a respetiva posição anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you applied an animation directly to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method, call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method again and pass it the animation that has been modified.
trans-unit.target: -Se aplicou uma animação diretamente para uma propriedade utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>método, a chamada de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>método novamente e transmita-a animação que tenha sido modificada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks.
trans-unit.target: -Se estiver a trabalhar diretamente no nível de relógio, criar e aplicar um novo conjunto de relógios e utilizá-los para substituir o conjunto anterior de relógios criados.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um dado vinculado animação, consulte [chave Spline animação exemplo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.target: Aplica-se associada a este animações <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> os respetivos destinos e inicia-los.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar interativamente este guião gráfico principal, tem de especificar o mesmo `containingObject` ao chamar os métodos interativos que utilizou para iniciar o guião gráfico principal quando este método é denominado, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos são criados para o guião gráfico principal e quaisquer linhas cronológicas nele contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Estes relógios são armazenados com `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: A partir de um acionadores guião gráfico principal da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.target: Um objeto incluído no mesmo âmbito nome como destinos de animações este guião gráfico principal.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o guião gráfico principal deve ser interativamente controllable; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se associada a este animações <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> os respetivos destinos e inicia-los, utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando aplica um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>para uma propriedade utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos anteriormente associados essa propriedade continuam a consumir recursos de sistema; o sistema de temporização não remove automaticamente estes relógios.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar problemas de desempenho quando aplica um grande número de relógios utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, deve remover os relógios composição da propriedade animada depois de estarem concluídas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias formas para remover um relógio.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover todos os relógios de uma propriedade, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>método do objeto animado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Especifique a propriedade que está a ser animada como o primeiro parâmetro e `null` como o segundo.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação remove todos os relógios de animação da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover um específico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>de uma lista de relógios, utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>obter um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Isto é geralmente feito o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>processador de eventos para um clock.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que os relógios de raiz apenas podem ser controlados por um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>devolve de propriedade de um relógio subordinado `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento não denomina-se a duração efetiva do relógio é indefinidamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o utilizador tem de determinar quando deve chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Isto é principalmente um problema para animações em objetos que têm uma duração de tempo.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando um objeto é memória libertada, os relógios também estiver desligados e libertação da memória.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os objetos de relógio, consulte [animação e descrição geral do sistema de temporização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animações sem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>são aplicadas a `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o guião gráfico principal deve ser interativamente controllable; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets within the specified template and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se associada a este animações <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> os respetivos destinos dentro do modelo especificado e inicia-los.

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se as propriedades de destino já estão a ser animadas, são substituídos utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>comportamento handoff.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é denominado, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos são criados para o storyboard e quaisquer linhas cronológicas nele contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Estes relógios são armazenados com `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: A partir de um acionadores guião gráfico principal da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The object to which the specified `frameworkTemplate` has been applied.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a que o especificado `frameworkTemplate` foi aplicada.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animações sem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>são aplicadas a `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The template to animate.
trans-unit.target: O modelo para animar.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se associada a este animações <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> os respetivos destinos e inicia-los, utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto incluído no mesmo âmbito nome como destinos de animações este guião gráfico principal.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animações sem uma determinada <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>são aplicadas a `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento a animação novo deve utilizar para interagir com quaisquer animações atuais.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se associada a este animações <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> os respetivos destinos e inicia-los, utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the specified handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se as propriedades de destino já estão a ser animadas, são substituídos utilizando o comportamento de handoff especificado.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar interativamente este guião gráfico principal, tem de especificar o mesmo `containingObject` ao chamar os métodos interativos que utilizou para iniciar o guião gráfico principal quando este método é denominado, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos são criados para o guião gráfico principal e quaisquer linhas cronológicas nele contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Estes relógios são armazenados com `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: A partir de um acionadores guião gráfico principal da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a compor HandoffBehavior quando aplica um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>para uma propriedade utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos anteriormente associados essa propriedade continuam a consumir recursos de sistema; o sistema de temporização não remove automaticamente estes relógios.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar problemas de desempenho quando aplica um grande número de relógios utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, deve remover os relógios composição da propriedade animada depois de estarem concluídas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias formas para remover um relógio.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover todos os relógios de uma propriedade, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>método do objeto animado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Especifique a propriedade que está a ser animada como o primeiro parâmetro e `null` como o segundo.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação remove todos os relógios de animação da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover um específico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>de uma lista de relógios, utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>obter um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Isto é geralmente feito o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>processador de eventos para um clock.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que os relógios de raiz apenas podem ser controlados por um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>devolve de propriedade de um relógio subordinado `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento não denomina-se a duração efetiva do relógio é indefinidamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o utilizador tem de determinar quando deve chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Isto é principalmente um problema para animações em objetos que têm uma duração de tempo.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando um objeto é memória libertada, os relógios também estiver desligados e libertação da memória.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os objetos de relógio, consulte [animação e descrição geral do sistema de temporização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Para controlar interativamente este guião gráfico principal, tem de utilizar o mesmo `containingObject` parâmetro ao chamar os métodos interativos que utilizou para iniciar o storyboard quando este método é denominado, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos são criados para o storyboard e quaisquer linhas cronológicas nele contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Estes relógios são armazenados com `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: A partir de um acionadores guião gráfico principal da <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a compor HandoffBehavior quando aplica um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>para uma propriedade utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objetos anteriormente associados essa propriedade continuam a consumir recursos de sistema; o sistema de temporização não remove automaticamente estes relógios.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar problemas de desempenho quando aplica um grande número de relógios utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, deve remover os relógios composição da propriedade animada depois de estarem concluídas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias formas para remover um relógio.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover todos os relógios de uma propriedade, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>método do objeto animado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Especifique a propriedade que está a ser animada como o primeiro parâmetro e `null` como o segundo.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação remove todos os relógios de animação da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover um específico <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>de uma lista de relógios, utilize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>obter um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Isto é geralmente feito o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>processador de eventos para um clock.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que os relógios de raiz apenas podem ser controlados por um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>devolve de propriedade de um relógio subordinado `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>evento não denomina-se a duração efetiva do relógio é indefinidamente.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o utilizador tem de determinar quando deve chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Isto é principalmente um problema para animações em objetos que têm uma duração de tempo.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando um objeto é memória libertada, os relógios também estiver desligados e libertação da memória.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os objetos de relógio, consulte [animação e descrição geral do sistema de temporização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>, efetuar cópias profundas de valores deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando copiar propriedades de dependência, este método copia enlaces de referências e os dados de recursos (mas já não poderão resolver), mas não animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A> when creating new instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class for the various cloning methods (such as <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>).

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> que foi criada para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or 0 if the clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade global atual, ou 0 se o relógio está parado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> que foi criada para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: A clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: Um relógio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>velocidade é a velocidade a que a respetiva hora de é atualmente evoluir, em comparação comparada a hora do mundo real.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar este método para obter informações sobre o relógio um guião gráfico principal, tem de ser controllable de guião gráfico principal.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar um guião gráfico principal controllable no código, tem de utilizar a sobrecarga adequada do storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>método e especifique `true` para torná-lo controllable.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte [como: controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object specified when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method was called.
trans-unit.target: O objeto especificado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> método foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: This object contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto contém os <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> objetos que foram criados para esta guião gráfico principal e os respectivos valores secundários.

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: A velocidade global atual, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o relógio está parado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> que foi criada para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: A clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: Um relógio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>velocidade é a velocidade a que a respetiva hora de é atualmente evoluir, em comparação comparada a hora do mundo real.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar este método para obter informações sobre o relógio um guião gráfico principal, tem de ser controllable de guião gráfico principal.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar um guião gráfico principal controllable no código, tem de utilizar a sobrecarga adequada do storyboard <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>método e especifique `true` para torná-lo controllable.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte [como: controlar um guião gráfico principal depois desta ser iniciada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the clock is stopped.

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: Iteração primeiro um relógio tem um valor de 1.

trans-unit.source: If this storyboard has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: Se esta guião gráfico principal tiver um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>definição de `true`, uma iteração completa é composta por um par de reencaminhamento inversa, não apenas um destes segmenta.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: Iteração primeiro um relógio tem um valor de 1.

trans-unit.source: If this clock's timeline has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: Se a linha cronológica este clock tem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>definição de `true`, uma iteração completa é composta por um par de reencaminhamento inversa, não apenas um destes segmenta.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Independentemente da respetiva iteração atual, para procurar um relógio devolve a iteração atual para 1.

trans-unit.source: Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Também reiniciar um relógio devolve o respetiva iteração atual para 1.
